This app demonstrates:

1. All parameters of `input_date_range`:
   - Default behavior
   - Custom start/end dates
   - Min/max constraints
   - Custom format
   - Different startview options
   - Custom weekstart
   - Different language options
   - Custom separator
   - Custom width
   - Autoclose behavior

2. Features:
   - Sidebar layout for inputs
   - Card layout for outputs
   - Sample data generation
   - Reactive filtering of data
   - Display of all selected ranges
   - Preview of filtered data

3. Data handling:
   - Uses synthetic time series data
   - Demonstrates date filtering
   - Shows how to handle date conversions

4. UI organization:
   - Clean sidebar layout
   - Card-based output display
   - Responsive design
   - Clear labeling of all options

The app creates synthetic daily data and allows users to interact with various date range input configurations while showing the selected ranges and filtered data in a clear, organized layout.
